hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Ip
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the ip of server in which CAMPP backend is running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Port
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port of server in which CAMPP backend is running

definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { APPLICATION_NAME = "CAMPP_Backend_Api_Test" NOTIFYUSERS = ' barclays@newtglobalcorp.com,sreem@newtglobalcorp.com,syed.h@newtglobalcorp.com,maheshm@newtglobal.com,madhavi@newtglobal.com,kavyasrim@newtglobal.com,pranavkorde@newtglobal.com,pankajkumar@newtglobal.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } parameters { string(name: 'Ip', defaultValue: '18.221.187.16', description: 'Enter the ip of server in which CAMPP backend is running') string(name: 'Port', defaultValue: '8182', description: 'Enter the port of server in which CAMPP backend is running') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 2, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout") { steps { deleteDir() echo "Checkout the code" git branch: "main", credentialsId: 'newtglobaladmin', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/CAMPP_QA_Test.git' } } stage ("Running Tests") { steps { echo "---------------------Configuration Ip and Port---------------------------" sh "sed -i 's/18.221.187.16/${params.Ip}/g' /home/jenkins/workspace/CAMPP/API_Test/src/test/java/com/utility/ApplicationConstants.java" sh" sed -i 's/8182/${params.Port}/g' /home/jenkins/workspace/CAMPP/API_Test/src/test/java/com/utility/ApplicationConstants.java" echo "------------------------Running testcases--------------------------------" sh "mvn -f /home/jenkins/workspace/CAMPP/API_Test clean test" } } } post { always { emailext attachmentsPattern: 'target/surefire-reports/emailable-report.html', subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${APPLICATION_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS} BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } } }
